pages.text: Finally, some more progress. By using void metal (from the school of thaumaturgy) as a reagent and the untamed soul as a catalyst in an alchemy circle, the void metal seems to do... something... to the soul, binding them together in the process. Its properties are astounding, being soft and squishy, but also perfectly rigid. I think the possibilities with this... soulium... are almost limitless.

I can even sometimes hear it... whispering? No, that cannot be. It was purged of all its individuality during the binding process. But something...$(br2)Something tells me to make more of these. To continue my research.$(br2)I must.
